name: Myths: Dungeon
description:
Guide your group of adventurer and defeat bosses in this mobile roguelike experience !

The game is still under development.

To play th game, download the apk file and run it on your Android device (no ios build available).

How to play : 

You control a group of 7 adventurers : 2 tanks at the front, 3 damage dealers and 2 healers at the back.

To attack the boss, simply drag a character to the boss and it will attack him, dealing damage. Healers can't attack the boss, but you can drag them to an ally to heal it.

After performing an action, each character must wait for a while before attacking again.

Once defeated, the boss will loot items, you can hold your finger on an item to see its effects and drag it to a character to equip it (1 item per character), if you don't want the item, drag the EXP icon to a character to level it up.

Continue to fight the bosses as much as you can !

You can also customize your team with various character classes before starting a new run !

Good luck !
